full_summary:
**Chairs Order Tender Announcement**
### Description of Bid Opportunity
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is inviting contractors to submit bids for the supply of office chairs to Gold River, BC. The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is available to licensed suppliers.

### Key Details
* **Contract Reference Number**: cb-65-62822451
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: M2989-4-0016/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, June 14, 2024, at 17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Tuesday, June 19, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Tuesday, July 24, 2024

### Mandatory Requirements
* Suppliers must be pre-qualified and hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) with the Government of Canada.
* Contractors must demonstrate compliance with the Canadian Security Clearance Program.

### Scope of Work
The RCMP requires the delivery and installation of office chairs to Gold River, BC, by July 3, 2024. Suppliers must guarantee that the delivered products meet the required specifications and are compatible with existing office furniture.

### Inquiries
Contractor inquires and questions should be directed to [kathy.okamoto@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:kathy.okamoto@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) ( Phone: 778-290-4498).

### Evaluation Criteria
The tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price criterion.

### Supporting Documents
The bid solicitation documents can be found on the Canadabuys website:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38566/en_rfp_gold-river_chairs---2024-05-21\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38566/en_rfp_gold-river_chairs---2024-05-21\_0.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38566/fr\_rfp\_gold-river-chairs---amd-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38566/fr\_rfp\_gold-river-chairs---amd-001.pdf)

---
